Headline: #34 South Michigan & #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at Michigan/112th
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan & #19 Michigan/119th buses temp. rerouted via Michigan, 111th, State, 115th & Michigan, due to fire department activity near Michigan/112th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan and #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 111th, State, 115th, then resume their normal routes on Michigan, due to fire department activity near Michigan/112th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Harlem (O'Hare Branch)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (O'Hare Branch) due to the report of a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (O'Hare Branch) due to the report of a minor fire at track level

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
